mapper.select: select id, name, icon, title, parent_id, parent_title, path, is_menu, client_route, is_cache, need_login, encode, sort, version from iotbj.page where id = #{id}
select id, name, icon, title, parent_id, parent_title, path, is_menu, client_route, is_cache, need_login, encode, sort, version from iotbj.page limit #{offset}, #{limit}

select page.* from user_role inner join role_page on user_role.role_id = role_page.role_id inner join page on role_page.page_id = page.id where user_role.user_id=#{userId} and (page.client_route='t' or page.is_menu='t') order by page.parent_id asc,page.sort asc
mapper.insert: insert into iotbj.page(name, icon, title, parent_id, parent_title, path, is_menu, client_route, is_cache, need_login, encode, sort, version) values (#{name}, #{icon}, #{title}, #{parentId}, #{parentTitle}, #{path}, #{isMenu}, #{clientRoute}, #{isCache}, #{needLogin}, #{encode}, #{sort}, #{version})
mapper.update:
update iotbj.page
name = #{name},
icon = #{icon},
title = #{title},
parent_id = #{parentId},
parent_title = #{parentTitle},
path = #{path},
is_menu = #{isMenu},
client_route = #{clientRoute},
is_cache = #{isCache},
need_login = #{needLogin},
encode = #{encode},
sort = #{sort},
version = #{version},
where id = #{id}
